result.html: D'imigh an chéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ an ċéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.

result.eng: Hurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ga: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeachtHurry up, the train is about to leave!
result.ponchtml: Déan deifir tá an traein ar tí imeaċtHurry up, the train is about to leave!

result.eng: I think the train is about to leave.
result.ga: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.orig: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeacht
result.html: Is dóigh liom go bhfuil an traein ar tí imeachtI think the train is about to leave.
result.ponchtml: Is dóiġ liom go ḃfuil an traein ar tí imeaċtI think the train is about to leave.

result.html: Stop an traeinThe train stopped.
result.ponchtml: Stop an traeinThe train stopped.

result.eng: People started getting off the train.
result.ga: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.orig: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traein
result.html: Thosaigh daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ daoine ag tuirlingt den traeinPeople started getting off the train.

result.eng: The train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ga: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.orig: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.html: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein ag dul díreaċ ó mo ṫeaċ go dtí mo láṫair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.

result.html: Tá an traein ag imeachtThe train is departing.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein ag imeaċtThe train is departing.

result.html: Tá an traein imitheThe train has left.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein imiṫeThe train has left.

result.eng: We expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ga: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.orig: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.html: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seaċt a ċlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.

result.eng: I go to work by train.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an obair ar an traein
result.orig: Téim go dtí an obair ar an traein
result.html: Téim go dtí an obair ar an traeinI go to work by train.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an obair ar an traeinI go to work by train.

result.eng: Sleep descended on him in the train.
result.ga: Thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.orig: Thit a chodladh air sa traein
result.html: Thit a chodladh air sa traeinSleep descended on him in the train.
